content: ST 1800 Metal construction screwdriver Screwdriver with adjustable torque for steel and metal applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Universal screwdriver for a wide range of applications in metal construction Torque clutch – helps to prevent over-driving or screw head breakage Depth gauge – controls compression of the sealing washer to help ensure a tight seal For higher productivity and greater working comfort, use with the SDT stand-up handle and ST-SG screw guide Applications Driving self-drilling and self-tapping screws in a wide range of materials including steel, aluminum and wood Fastening overlapping profile metal sheets for siding and decking (including collated screws) Fastening sandwich panels Fastening liner trays Screwing together steel or aluminum profiles ### TECHNICAL DATA: RPM: 1900 rpm Max. torque: 194.7 in-lbf Rated voltage: 120 V Technical Data | RPM | 1900 rpm | Max. torque | 194.7 in-lbf | Rated voltage | 120 V | Weight | 4.2 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 12.1 x 2.8 x 10.4 in | Chuck type | Quick-release chuck 1/4 in ### ITEMS- 3628291 - ST 1800 ADJ TORQ SCREWDRIVER, SDT9 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST 1800 120V Metal constr screwdr assy - 1x COVER CAP (REPAIR PART) - 1x Integrated driver and setter SDT 5/16 - 1x Nose piece SDT 9-NP B black - 1x Nose piece SDT 9-NP R red - 1x Screw magazine - 1x Handle - 1x SDT 9-F Stand-up handle - 378546 - Metal construction screwdriver ST 1800 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x ST 1800 120V Metal constr screwdr assy - 1x COVER CAP (REPAIR PART)
